name: ralph
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to vomit: He spent the next four hours ralphing over the side of the boat. She woke up to find her roommate ralphing into the trash can. It was enough to make you ralph up your dinner.
More examplesFewer examplesI ralphed into a barf bag all the way to the hospital.The whole family could hear him ralphing in the bathroom.It's called ralphing because of the sound people make when they are being sick.
